{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":2986284,"name":"Robert Deml","username":"rdeml","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/rdeml/{size}/160877_2.png","created_at":"2022-01-08T00:43:25.130Z","cooked":"

Team 8724 is proud to release the code it wrote to the world as Team 1519. Same students, different team number.

github.com

GitHub - frc8724/2020-Robot

Contribute to frc8724/2020-Robot development by creating an account on GitHub.

The code is divided into autonomous routines, commands, and subsystems.

One key Utility class is the PidTuner. This can be used with 4 buttons to tune a PID controlled subsystem in a live system.
